title: Rapha release limited edition Digital Woodland MTB Performance Trailwear
content:
Rapha have released the first limited edition print collection of their all-new MTB Performance Trailwear. The Digital Woodland Collection comprises Rapha x SMITH Forefront 2 Helmets and Pro Team Eyewear, print matched to Long and 3/4 Sleeve Jerseys for men, and Tanks and Short Sleeve Jerseys for women. Hopefully there’ll still be some available by […]

The post Rapha release limited edition Digital Woodland MTB Performance Trailwear appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
